review: I didn't know a sleep mask would have such a positive effect on my sleep! Also, the soft fabric is very nice to the skin. Highly recommended!
product_description: Our 7x sold-out and 2x award-winning Deep Sleep Mask. Increases relaxation to your eyes and comfort to fall asleep, is 100% Light-blocking to make you sleep deep through the night, without waking up. Designed and backed by dermatologists for healthier skin while you sleep.
sleep_benefits: Easier falling asleep and longer REM sleep
anti_aging_benefit: Prevents fine lines and eye wrinkles
packaging_information: Each product is individually packed and comes in its own box.
washing_instructionsDes: We always recommend using our washing bag and PH-neutral liquid wash detergent. Use the program delicate or hand wash at 30 degrees and don't spin dry (centrifuge). Air/hang dry and iron the pillowcase for a soft effect once dry.
free_shipping_offer: Free shipping on orders above 100 SAR
shipping_times_message: Please allow us the following shipping times
return_policy_info: We offer 30-day free returns for store credit. For a refund back to the original payment method, we will charge a small freight fee to dispatch your replacement, depending on your location. Products must be returned unworn, unwashed, in their original condition, and with all tags and liners attached.
why_people_love_mask: Why 50,000+ others love the Deep Sleep Mask
packaging_description: Every Dore & Rose product comes in beautiful, specially made packaging that's designed to make unboxing feel like a luxurious experience, whether it's for you or someone special.
silver_ion_technology_info: This 23 momme, mulberry silk sleep mask is treated with Silvadur® silver ion technology, a natural process of incorporating silver ions into fabrics for their antimicrobial properties. This effectively eliminates bacteria providing a protective barrier against germs and reducing the risk of infections or skin irritations.
dermatologists_love: Dermatologists Love the Deep Sleep Mask
recommendation: I recommend Dore & Rose to all my patients. It increases the effectiveness of your serums and moisturizers, while the softness of the silk avoids the formation of lines and folds on your face.
sleep_mask_info: Experience the ultimate sleep upgrade with our Deep Sleep Mask. It offers 100% light blocking for optimal darkness and a soft, gentle touch to your eyes. Drift off to sleep effortlessly and enjoy improved sleep quality, including enhanced REM cycles.
customer_panel_info: Based on a four-week independent customer panel
reduction_in_under_eye_bags: Noticed a reduction in under-eye bags
improve_sleep_quality_question: How can the Deep Sleep Mask improve my sleep quality?
improve_sleep_quality_info: Our Deep Sleep Mask blocks out light effectively, creating a dark environment that promotes deep, uninterrupted sleep. Secondly, due to the comfortable fit, it stays in place throughout the night. The soft breathable silk fabric allows for proper airflow and gives an extremely relaxing feeling to your eyes. Falling asleep was never this easy.
promote_better_skin_question: How does the Deep Sleep Mask promote better skin?
promote_better_skin_info: Our Deep Sleep Mask is made of the highest quality silk. The surface reduces friction, preventing sleep lines and wrinkles. It helps retain moisture, promoting a youthful complexion. The hypoallergenic silk is gentle on the skin, reducing irritation and inflammation. Experience anti-aging benefits with our Deep Sleep Mask.
suitable_for_all_skin_types_question: Is it suitable for every skin type?
suitable_for_all_skin_types_response: Sure! Unlike other skin care products, our products are suitable for all skin types.
product_testing_info: Absolutely! Our products are SGS certified. This is the largest testing organization worldwide. The tests show that the silver ions are still effective after 51 washes!
cotton_vs_silk_question: What is the biggest difference between cotton and silk?
cotton_vs_silk_info: Most people sleep on a cotton pillowcase, but did you know that after just 3 days there are as many bacteria on your pillowcase as there are on a toilet seat? Our silk pillowcases are infused with silver ions, eliminating 99.7% of all bacteria. Silk is also naturally super soft, cooling, and hypoallergenic.
price_and_delivery_info: One piece for 99 SAR + free delivery
price_and_delivery_infoTwo: Two pieces for 160 SAR + free delivery
price_and_delivery_infoThree: Three pieces for 220 SAR + free delivery
RefundPolicyDescription: At Smarketing LLC, we pride ourselves on the quality of our products and our commitment to customer satisfaction. Should you find yourself not entirely pleased with your purchase, we want to clarify that we do not process refunds or accept returns. However, we are pleased to provide an easy replacement option, provided that the limited warranty was included in your order.
ExtendedWarrantyDescription: For those who have opted for our extended warranty and face any problems with your order, such as receiving damaged or defective products, we kindly ask you to get in touch with our customer support team within 14 days following delivery.
ReplacementProductDescription: Under these circumstances, we will quickly arrange to send you a replacement product at no additional charge.
SmoothProcessDescription: To ensure a seamless and efficient replacement procedure, please contact our customer support at info@smarketing.llc. Our team is dedicated to assisting you and making sure your experience with us is outstanding.
AppreciationMessage: We appreciate your choice to shop with Smarketing LLC and eagerly look forward to serving you again.
ThankYouMessageShippingPolicy: We appreciate your decision to shop with Smarketing LLC. Our goal is to provide an outstanding shopping experience. To help you understand our delivery process, we encourage you to review our shipping policy.
ProcessingTimeDescription: Expect a processing period of 2-3 business days after placing your order. Our dedicated staff diligently checks and packs each item, ensuring it's in perfect condition before dispatch from our warehouse.
ShippingTimeDescription: Post-processing, your order should arrive within 6-12 business days, though this can vary based on your location and unforeseen external influences.
TrackingYourOrderDescription: We keep you updated on your order's journey by providing a tracking number as soon as available. Use this number for real-time updates and tracking of your shipment.
ShippingMethodsDescription: Our shipping approach involves partnering with trustworthy carriers, ensuring your order arrives safely and promptly.
ShippingDelaysDescription: We aim for timely delivery, but please be aware that external conditions like weather may sometimes cause minor delays. We'll keep you informed and actively work to address any significant delays.
AddressAccuracyDescription: To avoid delivery issues, please ensure your shipping address is correct and complete. We cannot take responsibility for orders sent to incorrect or incomplete addresses provided by customers.
MissingOrDamagedPackagesDescription: Should your package be lost or arrive damaged, contact our customer support immediately. In cases of shipping or delivery errors, we'll work swiftly to rectify the situation and provide a fitting solution. Your satisfaction is paramount at Smarketing LLC. For any queries or additional assistance, our customer support team is available at info@smarketing.llc to assist you.
HappyShoppingMessage: Enjoy your shopping experience and thank you for being a cherished customer!
Operated By: This website is operated by Smarketing LLC. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us”, and “our” refer to Smarketing LLC. Smarketing LLC offers this website, including all information, tools, and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies, and notices stated here.
Engagement: By visiting our site and/or purchasing something from us, you engage in our “Service” and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”, “Terms”), including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and/or contributors of content.
Reading Terms: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the website or use any services. If these Terms of Service are considered an offer, acceptance is expressly limited to these Terms of Service.
New Features: Any new features or tools which are added to the current store shall also be subject to the Terms of Service. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at any time on this page. We reserve the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and/or changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
Shopify Hosting: Our store is hosted on Shopify Inc. They provide us with the online e-commerce platform that allows us to sell our products and services to you.

You agree to promptly update your account and other information, including your email address and credit card numbers and expiration dates, so that we can complete your transactions and contact you as needed.

Privacy_Policy_P1: This Privacy Policy outlines how Smarketing LLC (referred to as the 'Site', 'we', 'us', or 'our') collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you visit, use our services, or make a purchase from smarketingllc.com (the 'Site') or otherwise engage in communication with us (collectively, the 'Services'). When we mention 'you' and 'your', it refers to you as the user of the Services, whether you are a customer, website visitor, or any individual whose information we have collected in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
Privacy_Policy_P2: Please read this Privacy Policy thoroughly. By utilizing and accessing any of the Services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as detailed in this Privacy Policy. If you do not consent to this Privacy Policy, please refrain from using or accessing any of the Services.
Privacy_Policy_Changes_P1: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect any changes in our practices or as required by legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will post the revised Privacy Policy on the Site, update the 'Last updated' date, and perform any additional actions required by applicable law.
COLLECTION_TITLE: How We Collect and Use Your Personal Information
COLLECTION_P1: To deliver the Services, we collect and have collected over the past 12 months personal information about you from a variety of sources, as set out below. The information that we collect and use varies depending on how you interact with us.
COLLECTION_P2: In addition to the specific uses set out below, we may use information we collect about you to communicate with you, provide the Services, comply with any applicable legal obligations, enforce any applicable terms of service, and to protect or defend the Services, our rights, and the rights of our users or others.
COLLECTION_P3: The types of personal information we obtain about you depends on how you interact with our Site and use our Services. When we use the term 'personal information,' we are referring to information that identifies, relates to, describes, or can be associated with you. The following sections describe the categories and specific types of personal information we collect.
Info_Collection_Title: Information We Collect Directly from You
Info_Collection_Intro: Information that you directly submit to us through our Services may include:
Contact_Details: Basic contact details including your name, address, phone number, and email.
Order_Information: Order information including your name, billing address, shipping address, payment confirmation, email address, and phone number.
Account_Information: Account information including your username, password, and security questions.
Shopping_Information: Shopping information including the items you view, put in your cart, or add to your wishlist.
Customer_Support_Information: Customer support information including the information you choose to include in communications with us, for example, when sending a message through the Services.
Info_Collection_Features_Note: Some features of the Services may require you to directly provide us with certain information about yourself. You may elect not to provide this information, but doing so may prevent you from using or accessing these features.
Cookies_Collection_Description: We and our service providers may collect certain information about your use of our services through automated means, such as cookies, often referred to as 'Usage Data'. This may include details like your IP address, device information, and browsing behavior on our Site.
Third_Party_Info_Title: Information We Obtain from Third Parties
Third_Party_Info_Intro: Finally, we may obtain information about you from third parties, including vendors and service providers who may collect information on our behalf, such as:
Support_Companies: Companies that support our Site and Services, such as Shopify.
Payment_Processors: Our payment processors, who collect payment information (e.g., bank account, credit or debit card information, billing addresses) to process your payments and fulfill your orders.
Interaction_Tracking: When you visit our Site, open or click on emails we send you, or interact with our Services or advertisements, we, or third parties we work with, may automatically collect certain information using online tracking technologies such as pixels, web beacons, software developer kits, and cookies.
Third_Party_Info_Compliance: Any information we obtain from third parties will be treated in accordance with this Privacy Policy. We are not responsible for the accuracy of the information provided to us by third parties nor for their policies or practices. For more detailed information, see the section below, Third-Party Websites and Links.
Use_Personal_Info_Title: How We Use Your Personal Information
Use_Personal_Info_P1: Providing Products and Services: We use your personal information to provide you with the Services in order to perform our contract with you, including to process your payments, fulfill your orders, send notifications to you related to your account, and manage transactions such as returns, exchanges, and reviews.
Use_Personal_Info_P2: Marketing and Advertising: We use your personal information for marketing and promotional purposes, such as to send marketing, advertising, and promotional communications by email, text message, or postal mail, and to show you advertisements for products or services on our Site and other websites.
Use_Personal_Info_P3: Security and Fraud Prevention: We use your personal information to detect, investigate, or take action regarding possible fraudulent, illegal, or malicious activity. You are responsible for keeping your account credentials safe, and we strongly recommend that you do not share your user information.
Disclosure_Intro: In certain circumstances, Smarketing LLC may disclose your personal information to third parties for legitimate purposes in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Such circumstances may include:
Vendors_Services: Engaging with vendors or other third parties who perform services on our behalf, such as management, payment processing, data analytics, customer support, and logistics.
Business_Marketing_Partners: Collaborating with business and marketing partners, including platforms like Shopify, to facilitate services and advertising. We work with these partners to offer personalized advertising and they use your information according to their own privacy policies.
User_Consent: When you directly, request, or give consent to the disclosure of your information to third parties, such as when using social media widgets or login integrations.
Affiliates_Corporate_Group: Working with our affiliates or within our corporate group to maintain a successful business operation.
Business_Transactions: In the event of a business transaction, such as a merger or bankruptcy, to comply with legal obligations, respond to subpoenas, search warrants, or other requests, or to protect and enforce our legal rights and those of our users.
User_Generated_Content_P1: Smarketing LLC's Services may allow you to post product reviews and other user-generated content. If you opt to submit user-generated content to any public area of the Services, this content will be accessible to anyone.
User_Generated_Content_P2: We do not control who will have access to the information you decide to make public, and we cannot ensure that parties who have access to such information will respect your privacy or keep it secure. We are not responsible for the privacy or security of any information that you make publicly available, or for the accuracy, use, or misuse of any information that you disclose or receive from third parties.
Third_Party_Websites_Links_P1: Our Site may provide links to websites or other online platforms operated by third parties. If you follow links to sites not affiliated or controlled by us, you should review their privacy and security policies and other terms and conditions. We do not guarantee and are not responsible for the privacy or security of such sites, including the responsibility, completeness, or reliability of information found on these sites. Information you provide on public or semi-public venues, including information shared on third-party social networking platforms, may also be viewable by other users of the Services and/or users of those third-party platforms without limitation as to its use by us or by any third party. Our inclusion of such links does not, by itself, imply an endorsement of the content found on those sites or of their operators.
Security_Retention_Title: Security and Retention of Your Information
Security_Retention_P1: Please be aware that no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and we cannot guarantee 'perfect security.' In addition, any information you send to Smarketing LLC may not be secure while in transit. We recommend that you do not use unsecure channels to communicate sensitive or confidential information to us.
Security_Retention_P2: The duration for which we retain your personal information depends on various factors, such as whether we need the information to maintain your account, provide the Services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, or enforce other applicable contracts and policies.
Rights_And_Choices_Intro: Depending on where you live, you may have some or all of the rights listed below in relation to your personal information. However, these rights are not absolute, may apply only in certain circumstances, and, in certain cases, we may decline your request as permitted by law.
Right_To_Access_Know: You may have a right to request access to personal information that we hold about you, including details relating to the ways in which we use and share your information.
Right_To_Delete: You may have a right to request that we delete personal information we maintain about you.
Right_To_Correct: You may have a right to request that we correct inaccurate personal information we maintain about you.
Right_To_Portability: You may have a right to receive a copy of the personal information we hold about you and to request that we transfer it to a third party, in certain circumstances and with certain exceptions.
Right_To_Opt_Out_Of_Sale_Or_Sharing: You may have a right to direct us not to 'sell' or 'share' your personal information or to opt out of the processing of your personal information for purposes considered to be 'targeted advertising', as defined in applicable privacy laws.
Rights_And_Processing_Title: Your Rights and Processing of Personal Information
Restriction_Of_Processing: You may have the right to ask us to stop or restrict our processing of personal information.
Withdrawal_Of_Consent: Where we rely on consent to process your personal information, you may have the right to withdraw this consent.
Appeal_Process: You may have a right to appeal our decision if we decline to process your request. You can do so by replying directly to our denial.
Managing_Comm_Preferences: We may send you promotional emails, and you may opt out of receiving these at any time by using the unsubscribe option displayed in our emails to you. If you opt out, we may still send you non-promotional emails, such as those about your account or orders that you have made.
Exercise_Rights_Information: You may exercise any of these rights where indicated on our Site or by contacting us using the contact details provided below.
Non_Discrimination_Statement: We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of these rights. We may need to collect information from you to verify your identity, such as your email address or account information, before providing a substantive response to the request.
Designation_Of_Agent: You may designate an authorized agent to make requests on your behalf to exercise your rights. Before accepting such a request from an agent, we will require that the agent provide proof you have authorized them to act on your behalf, and we may need you to verify your identity directly with us.
Timely_Response_Assurance: We will respond to your request in a timely manner as required under applicable law.
Complaints_Content: If you have complaints about how we process your personal information, please contact us using the contact details provided below. If you are not satisfied with our response to your complaint, depending on where you live you may have the right to appeal our decision by contacting us using the contact details set out below, or lodge your complaint with your local data protection authority.
International_Users_Content: Please note that we may transfer, store, and process your personal information outside the country you live in, including the United States. Your personal information is also processed by staff and third party service providers and partners in these countries. If we transfer your personal information out of Europe, we will rely on recognized transfer mechanisms like the European Commission's Standard Contractual Clauses, or any equivalent contracts issued by the relevant competent authority of the UK, as relevant, unless the data transfer is to a country that has been determined to provide an adequate level of protection.
Contact_Content: Should you have any questions about our privacy practices or this Privacy Policy, or if you would like to exercise any of the rights available to you, please call or email us at info@smarketing.llc.
ThankYouMessage: Thank you for purchasing our products. Your order has been successfully received and we will process it as soon as possible.
ShippingConfirmation: A shipping confirmation will be sent to you via WhatsApp
FirstTimeDiscount: Get 10% discount for the first time
AlreadySentBefore: This number has already been sent before
